微生物化合物为白癜风治疗提供了希望据报道，源自肠道友好型细菌的天然化合物显着减慢了白癜风的进展并可能恢复色素沉着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/microbial-compounders-formers-hope-for-for-vitiligo-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/microbial-compounders-formers-hope-for-for-vitiligo-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78032588-59E0-4081-BC16-3E6C36FFFE193 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:18:19 -0500 Microbial compound offers hope for vitiligo treatment
用新技术生长的T细胞提供更好的癌症防御匹兹堡大学的研究人员开发了一种新的方法来在实验室中种植T细胞，使其能够在黑色素瘤小鼠模型中寿命更长，更好地破坏癌细胞，而在传统生长培养基中生长的癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/t-cells-rown--new-new-new-technique-offer-better-better-cancer-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/t-cells-rown--new-new-technique-new-technique-ferfer-better-better-cancer-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54951B7C-B2C6-4E4E-8185-1350A550F548 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:13:29 -0500 T cells grown with new technique offer better cancer defense
新系统使用声波精确地分离肿瘤细胞据世界卫生组织称，癌症在2020年造成了近1000万人的死亡 - 几乎每六人中的六人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-system-uses-uses-acoustic-waves-to-separate-to-separate-tumor-cells-with-precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-system-system-uses-acoustic-waves-to-separate-to-separate-tumor-cells-cells-with-precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169b8ae2-2A64-418B-BEA1-A2E44BEC61F1 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:08:08 -0500 New system uses acoustic waves to separate tumor cells with precision
为什么2型糖尿病患者不仅需要血糖监测近一半的2型糖尿病患者患有微量营养素缺乏症，其中维生素D和镁是最常见的，突出了糖尿病护理中的关键差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/why-type-2-diabetes-patients-patients-more-more-than-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-blood-sugar-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/why-type-2-diabetes-patients-patients-more-more-than-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-blood-sugar-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f25ec85-343c-44c9-acc7-5588704af824 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:02:00 -0500 Why Type 2 diabetes patients need more than just blood sugar monitoring
NHS引入了基因测试，以帮助减少黑人捐助者的肾衰竭风险现在，英国的黑人非洲和黑人加勒比海遗产的数百个潜在的肾脏供体现在可以进行简单的血液检查，以帮助降低肾衰竭的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/nhs-intrododuces-genetic-test-te-to-to-help-reduce-kidney-failure-failure--for-for-black-black-donors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/nhs-introduces-genetic-test-to-to-to-help-reduce-kidney-failure-failure--for-for-black-for-black-donors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79E359AF-909D-4F6D-95CD-0E1A73965671 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:55:00 -0500 NHS introduces genetic test to help reduce kidney failure risk for black donors
细胞周期蛋白B上的口袋确保细胞分裂的正确序列蛋白质细胞周期蛋白B上的“口袋”负责确保细胞分裂的步骤以正确的顺序进行。康斯坦茨大学研究人员的两项研究调查了为什么是这种情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/pocket-on-cyclin-b-seners-correct-correct-correct-correct-sequerence-of-cell-division.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/pocket-on-cyclin-b-seners-correct-correct-correct-sequerce-of-cell-division.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bd55b13-9988-4d76-b80f-cf46ba12ba83 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:47:49 -0500 Pocket on cyclin B ensures correct sequence of cell division
简单的会议可以改善小儿重症监护人的福祉由阿斯顿大学研究人员与伯明翰儿童医院和NHS England合作领导的员工健康项目（Swell）项目，已经开发了两个简单，易于送达的课程，以改善英国儿科医疗（PCC）的福祉。医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/simple-sessions-can-improve-wellbeing-petiatric-critical-critication-critical-care-care-staff.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/simple-sessions-can-improve-wellbeing-of-petiatric-critical-critical-care-care-care-staff.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bd7e734-7f72-4d47-4d47-a862-8799997b6a85 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:37:49 -0500 Simple sessions can improve wellbeing of pediatric critical care staff
新的输送系统可以提高基于肽的癌症疫苗的有效性根据高级功能材料发表的一项新研究，Terasaki生物医学创新研究所的研究人员开发了一种创新的输送系统，可以显着提高基于肽的癌症疫苗的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-delivery-system-system-could-improve-the-fellectime--cancer-cancer-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-delivery-system-system-could-improve-the-fellectime--cancer-cancer-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2E1818A6-CC48-4AA8-903D-690CBE1E28B1 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:32:06 -0500 New delivery system could improve the effectiveness of peptide-based cancer vaccines
研究确定了精神分裂症患者的对比感知不足精神分裂症是一种严重的精神障碍，影响了世界人口的1％。巴塞罗那大学的研究人员确定了精神分裂症患者的对比感知的赤字。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-Identifies-contrast-coption-poception-deficit-inficific--inpeople-with-schizizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-indistifies-contrast-contrast-poception-deficit-inficificit-in-people-with-schizizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ff80249-b3ff-4A07-87-87F2-339A620DB864 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:27:34 -0500 Study identifies contrast perception deficit in people with schizophrenia
口服粪便移植可以帮助预防干细胞移植患者的移植物抗宿主疾病一项新的研究表明，口服粪便微生物群移植（FMT）是防止接受血液癌干细胞移植的患者的可行且安全的补充。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/oral-fecal-transplantation-could-help-prevent-praft-graft-vers--versus-host-host-host-disease-host-disease-nstem-cell-cell-transplant-plant-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/oral-fecal-transplantation-could-help-prevent-prevent-graft-versus-versus-host-host-disease-host-disease-nstem-cell-cell-cell-transplant-transplant-patients.aspx#Comment.Comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d009b58-267d-4796-bfa0-bfa0-b15f00f00f54444 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:22:44 -0500 Oral fecal transplantation could help prevent graft-versus-host disease in stem cell transplant patients
